
This file was extracted from a fork of pocooco pluginbase. We tried 
(a) submodule 
(b) requirements.txt/setup.py requirements

Both seems to be less robust. Submodule setup was having issues with
readthedocs setup.

https://github.com/pingali/pluginbase

This submodule import bug should have been fixed but it was failing. 

https://github.com/rtfd/readthedocs.org/issues/606
